author: Special Correspondent
text:
Youth attacked

A group of students attacked a 20-year-old youth and caused bleeding injuries on his head, for the victim had warned the main accused against following a ninth standard girl, at Usilampatti on Wednesday. Samaiyan (20) of Chinnakattalai was assaulted by 10 persons, led by polytechnic student D. Shenbagamoorthi (19), at the bus stand in the morning. Shenbagamoorthi was irked by Samaiyan and his relative Thandeeswaran over questioned him for having proposed to Thandeeswaran’s minor sister recently. Among the assailants were boys in the age group of 13 to 17 years.
title: Teenagers attack youth in bus stand
